thread.title: Nick
thread.title_full: Personalized Paper Manufacturing Group reviewed by Nick

author: Nick
title: Nick
text: They printed my order exactly how I wanted it. They sent a proof before printing, which I asked to make a couple changes to. They quickly implemented the changes and I received the final product not shortly after. Everyone at our company was pleased with how it turned out!
